title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 125.2 - Filing requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 125.2 - Filing requirements

State Regulations

Every electric corporation and every municipality subject
to the commission's jurisdiction providing electric service is required to
notify the commission of: (a) all
accidents (other than vehicular accidents on public highways) involving utility
facilities directly related to the production, transmission, or distribution of
electricity, which result in injury or death to nonemployees; and
(b) all work-related accidents (other than
vehicular accidents) involving utility facilities directly related to the
production, transmission, or distribution of electricity, which cause injuries
to utility company employees that result in hospitalization (inpatient
treatment) or death. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
125.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
